name: ArchivePurchaseOrder
description:
Archive a purchase order to manage records.

This tool is used to archive a purchase order by specifying its ID. It helps in managing and organizing purchase records efficiently.

parameters.name: purchase_order_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the purchase order to be archived.

parameters.name: archived_reason
parameters.description: Provide the reason for archiving the purchase order. This helps in keeping track of why the order is being archived for future reference and organization.

value_schema.description: Reason for archiving the purchase order.
